root: ^Me: There's some kind of voice, it was trying to convince me to shoot you.
^Me: And it felt like there was something forcing me to do it.
^Me: but I managed to subside the urge
^friend: thanks man, I appreciate you not shooting me
^voice: you dissapoint me, you think your friendship will save you? IT WON'T!!!
^Me: no problem, lets just keep moving
